posts.post_content:
I've been buying quite a few cards again and I'm slowly getting some of them listed for sale here: [url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/traeregan/for-sale[/url]

I have more on the way, some off at PSA and SGC, etc. and will do my best to keep that page updated.

I'm in no hurry to sell, but offers are always welcome.

Prices include shipping and I am flexible on payment method.

Thanks for looking.
I would like the SGC 10 T206 Jim Scott. If you take TTM payments.
Hi Ben, I've emailed you. Cheers
Would like these four if available.  Please PM payment instructions.  Thanks!
Hi Tim, sorry I have PMs disabled, but I've emailed you via the site. Thanks!
Bump. Added a few cards. Marked a few as sold too. Thanks for looking.
some great priced cards there mate
